title: TDR - Trade Duty Refund | Jocelyn Montpert's Profile
description: Meet Jocelyn Montpert, founder of Trade Duty Refund (TDR) and expert in global e-commerce supply chain solutions. Specializing in customer returns and logistics optimizations for retailers across Europe, the UK, and North America. Fluent in French and English, based in France.
bio: Jocelyn is the <strong>founder of Trade Duty Refund (TDR)</strong> and a <strong>consultant in e-commerce supply chain</strong>
skills: <ul class="interline"><li><strong>Global E-Commerce</strong>: Jocelyn has a proven track record in global e-commerce, helping companies navigate the intricacies of cross-border trade.</li><li><strong>Customer Returns</strong>: He has developed innovative solutions for managing customer returns, ensuring efficient and cost-effective processes.</li><li><strong>Supply Chain Solutions</strong>: Jocelyn has designed and implemented comprehensive supply chain solutions for major global retailers, optimizing their logistics operations.</li></ul>
geo: During his career, Jocelyn has developped his network and experience in Europe, UK and North America.
languages: Jocelyn is located in France and speaks 2 languages fluently: French and English.
